The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of a 5x5 arrangement of squares. All rows and columns contain an equal number of filled and empty squares. The filled squares are represented by 'X', and the empty squares are represented by empty spaces. There is a clear pattern of alternating filled and empty squares both horizontally and vertically. The top four rows are completely filled with 'X', while the bottom row contains only empty spaces.
